original_text: And he ran before, and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him: for he was to pass that way.
korean_text: 앞으로 달려가서 보기 위하여 돌무화과나무에 올라가니 이는 예수께서 그리로 지나가시게 됨이러라

sentences.original_text: and climbed up into a sycomore tree
for he was to pass that way
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 길로 지나갈 것이었기 때문입니다
